idea:
APARC ATTRACTIONS PRIVATE LIMITED is into design and manufacturing of Water Park Equipment. APARC is an MSME registered company which was established under Make in India initiative of the central government and to start manufacturing of water park slides and equipment in India. APARC was built with a sole purpose of achieving customer satisfaction by providing world class quality products and services in the waterpark industry.


Aparc has secured several prestigious projects from Indian and as well as foreign companies for export of water slides equipment. Currently Aparc exports slides to European countries like Italy, Netherlands and also to Australia.In addition to the above APARC has received projects from Indian companies like Mahindra Holidays Goa, Diamond Water Park Pune, Om Shiv Builders Virar and also APAC Integrated Pvt Ltd Mumbai.
name: APARC ATTRACTIONS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Ekalavya is an on-demand e-learning programme of acting & theatre courses. It's an initiative by Drama Schools Foundation Mumbai to democratize access to high-quality theatre education to millions of Indians who dream of becoming actors and directors. We would like to promote self-learning, enable creative expression, and cultivate theatre as a way of life. Ekalavya will become the essential first step on the journey of self-discovery for those who want to awaken the performer and storyteller within them.to democratise access to high quality performing arts training to all the aspirants across India.
name: Ekalavya: Online School of Drama
